summary: HeroSection was updated to render a new hero image for Vivan at the start of the section with alt text and a responsive two-column layout, but the diff does not show the required static image assets being added under frontend/public/assets (nor the square variant). Unrequested metadata files were also modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded photo (IMG_0098.jpeg) to the app as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/ (optimized for web) so it can be used in the hero/top section.
missing_requirements.reason: The HeroSection references an image at /assets/generated/vivan-hero.dim_1200x1500.jpg, but the diff shows no new files added under frontend/public/assets (or subfolders) and no evidence of an optimized/cropped asset being introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a square portrait variant for smaller layouts if needed (IMG_0098.jpeg > vivan-portrait-square.dim_800x800.jpg).
missing_requirements.reason: No added assets are shown in the diff, and there is no reference to a square portrait variant in the code changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to add a static photo asset and update HeroSection; it does not request updates to project summary/state tracking files.
